mapper.select: SELECT u.useridx, usership, user_id, user_name, user_pwd, enabled, reg_date FROM userall u JOIN user1 u1 ON u.useridx = u1.useridx WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND enabled != 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user1(useridx, user_id, user_name, user_pwd, enabled, reg_date) VALUES(#{useridx}, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pwd}, 1, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO user2(useridx, birth, email, addr1, addr2 zip, tel) VALUES(#{useridx}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel} #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT ALL INTO user1(useridx, user_id, user_name, user_pwd, enabled, reg_date) VALUES (#{useridx}, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pwd}, 1, SYSDATE) INTO user2(useridx, birth, email, addr1, addr2 zip, tel) VALUES(#{useridx}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel} #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
